entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
